about_the_game:
We present the next puzzle in our Christmas 2020 event - Frost Masters by Betty Elgyn. Once again, she manages to bring fantasy notes in the traditional spirit of the holiday.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Christmas Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a more challenging puzzle with a lot of similar areas and color tones. There are sufficient details all over the illustration, however, that should help you build it from several large pieces.
detailed_description:
We present the next puzzle in our Christmas 2020 event - Frost Masters by Betty Elgyn. Once again, she manages to bring fantasy notes in the traditional spirit of the holiday.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Christmas Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a more challenging puzzle with a lot of similar areas and color tones. There are sufficient details all over the illustration, however, that should help you build it from several large pieces.

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
